meta.title: The Fun and Fast Way & to build a web fits your needs
meta.description: I have seen many storms in my life. Most storms have caught me by surprise, so I had to learn very quickly to look further and understand that I am not capable of controlling the weather, to exercise the art of patience and to respect the fury of nature. Paulo Coelho

content.title: my nameis SAM "& I like to think"I'm javascript developer
content.desc: I don't have that huge number of projects or even huge projects to be proud of, but I can tell I am proud of how I got to learn stuff in very short time. though I don't really believe in long experience as much as I believe in hard smart work on improving skills.
content.label: Next

content.title: I Never wantedto be javascript developer
content.desc: At the time when I attended computer science back there in EGYPT, I have been fascinated with the  image proccing and animation apps (PS, AE and most of Adobe applications at the time) and as I gave more attention to the animation part there was that thing of "expressions" like script you type and the animation goes off :) and I had a need to know more about it, so as it was based on javascript; I decided to learn it. And ever since I never come back..

content.title: Of toolsand men
content.desc: Monitoring is only relevant through the analysis of the findings - we firmly believe that an automated process isn’t enough. Although the selection of the tools most appropriate to your issues is certainly important, it is the analysis from our multidisciplinary team specialised in complex corporate issues that provide the true value of our service.

content.title: Monitorto act
content.desc: To us, monitoring is but a part of the decision-making process. Tired of these report you struggle to find a use for? Be it for detecting opportunities or control a crisis, our alerts and reports help you understand the situations and guide you as to how you should react.

content.title: Bringingactionable insights
content.desc: The monitoring team is entirely integrated into Reputation Squad, the online communications and reputation management agency. With a team of 45 encompassing 7 areas of expertise (PR & communications consultants, lawyers, monitoring experts, social media managers, digital strategists, graphic designers, web developers) spread between London and Paris, we are able to help you transform your monitoring report into an action plan.

content.title: Ongoing monitoring
content.desc: We monitor mentions around your brand or areas of interest on a daily basis. This allows you to have a clear view of your online image :

list.desc: Types of monitoring: corporate, product, competition, industry, legal, notable individuals…

content.title: Audit / one-time analysis
content.desc: We thoroughly analyse a specific topic over a selected timeframe. Audits allow you to analyse a product launch, an event, a crisis or simply the image of your brand on the web.

content.title:
Crisis
monitoring
content.desc: During a crisis, you need a real-time monitoring system that is even more precise and efficient, carried out by experienced and dedicated consultants. We are able to set up a crisis response unit on demand.

content.title: The team
content.desc:
Monitoring project are led by our account directors and carried out by our monitoring experts, all of whom possess Master’s degrees from top schools and universities and are on permanent contracts, guaranteeing stability and know-how for your projects.
Each member of the team is able to rely on the in-house expertise of the agency, which includes skills as essential and diverse as social media, SEO, communications, law, etc.

content.title: Case studies
content.desc: Monitoring as a strategic tool remains relevant across any industry. Be it for communications, marketing or reputation purposes, blue chip companies have been using our services in order to gain strategic insight for operations and projects on an international scale.
